guild.name: Censorship

title: YouTube Deletes Comments That Insult China

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body:
I swear 90% of YouTube videos are deleted. Just go on any site linking to videos and you'll see what I'm talking about. It's mostly because YouTube thinks when they ban someone they have to delete every single one of their past videos too, #2 reason is Draconian "copyright" laws (which isn't their fault to be fair), and lastly we have specifically blocked videos.

The internet is never going to be good again. Even the free speech sites are going to be heavily under the control of the government for the foreseeable future. What would otherwise be legal can clearly be illegal simply because it's online. The first amendment simply doesn't seem to apply to the digital world, which is extremely highly regulated. Ironically Trump's executive order proves it, because this government control could also be used for the exact opposite purpose.
body_html:
I swear 90% of YouTube videos are deleted. Just go on any site linking to videos and you'll see what I'm talking about. It's mostly because YouTube thinks when they ban someone they have to delete every single one of their past videos too, #2 reason is Draconian "copyright" laws (which isn't their fault to be fair), and lastly we have specifically blocked videos.

The internet is never going to be good again. Even the free speech sites are going to be heavily under the control of the government for the foreseeable future. What would otherwise be legal can clearly be illegal simply because it's online. The first amendment simply doesn't seem to apply to the digital world, which is extremely highly regulated. Ironically Trump's executive order proves it, because this government control could also be used for the exact opposite purpose.

post.title: YouTube Deletes Comments That Insult China

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: The big corporations support China because socialism would mean their smaller competitors couldn't survive or would even become illegal, and the government would have more power to give them more money and power (in the name of the "common good" ofc).
